H0.text: A physical change occurs is the best description of an exothermic reaction.

H1.text: Equal amounts of products are produced is the best description of an exothermic reaction.

H2.text: Energy is required is the best description of an exothermic reaction.

H3.text: Energy is released is the best description of an exothermic reaction.

A5.text: The enthalpy change Î”H for a reaction is equal to the heat q transferred out of (or into) a closed system at constant pressure without in- or output of electrical energy.
